title: 449:  Jessica Lanyadoo Reads Grayston & Evan’s Charts!
itunes:title: 449:  Jessica Lanyadoo Reads Grayston & Evan’s Charts!
description:
It is a very special Tuesday episode, Broads! Today the #broadsquad’s favorite astrologer and psychic medium, Jessica Lanyadoo, sits down with The Bros (Bekah and Jessica’s partners - Grayston and Evan) and reads their astrological charts and answers their personal questions! 

Make sure to tune in Thursday for The Broad’s Bachelorette Finale recap and Friday for The Bros recap! 

 

JESSICA LANYADOO: 

Listen to “Ghost of a Podcast” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ghost-of-a-podcast-astrology-advice-with-jessica-lanyadoo/id1422483488 

Follow Jessica on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/jessica_lanyadoo/ 

Jessica’s website here: https://www.lovelanyadoo.com/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

FIRSTLEAF WINE CLUB: Get your first 6 bottles for $39.95 plus free shipping at TRYFIRSTLEAF.COM/CHATTY 

KIWICO: Get 50% off your first month plus FREE shipping on ANY crate line with code CHATTYBROADS at KIWICO.COM 

GRAMMARLY: Go to GRAMMARLY.COM/CHATTY to sign up for a free account and when you’re ready to upgrade to Grammarly Premium, you’ll get 20% off for being our listener! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
